title: scene_info does not reflect older changes to visuals

content.raw:
I already was asking about this in a Q&A thread [0] and did not get an answer yet. And I still believe that this is a bug: When you run gzserver and gzclient separately and then change the visual of an object (e.g. via pygazebo), the objects visual is not "memorized" on client side. If you stop gzclient and start it again the color is the old one. Also when not restarting gzclient and only requesting scene_info, the answer also contains the old color.

Currently using Gazebo 4.1 under Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS. 

Any info/help is very appreciated! 
Thanks a lot,
Stefan
